[Must Listen] Whales - From The Depths EP

Posted by Brittany Prevost on July 31, 2020

Every now and again, we come across an artist who completely captivates us. Tal Rochman, better known professionally as Whales (formerly Sex Whales) is our most recent discovery. His impressive resume matched with his strong will to overcome his Tourette syndrome is truly a pleasure to witness. Whether you are a longtime follower or a new fan, the Israeli producer is guaranteed to dazzle you with his undeniable skills!

In the past, you may have seen Whales' name span across various acclaimed labels such as DIM MAK, Circus Records, Never Say Die: Black Label, Monstercat and Buygore Records. Today, the rising star's stage name can, once again, be found alongside Disciple Round Table's as the duo has teamed up for another exciting EP.

That's right, Flag fam, as of July 31, 2020, you can finally get your hands on the highly anticipated From The Depths EP. The soon-to-be chart-topping six singles will transport you into a world full of only the best of dubstep. Get ready to dive into the punny tracks - they are a sure-fire way to get your bass fix! Furthermore, be sure to check out the brand-new Code: Pandorum collaboration. 'The Kraken' is an absolute BANGER! 

[Listen] Whales - From The Depths EP:

 

WHALES · Whales - From The Depths EP

Written By Brittany Prevost
